p: To perform HTS, MDCK cells were infected with the PR8-Gluc virus at 0.01 MOI, in the presence of test compounds of 20 µM (0.2% DMSO). In each 96-well plate, DMSO and baloxavir acid were used as negative and positive controls, respectively. Plates were incubated at 37 °C for 36 h, followed by luciferase activity measurement.
